who-is-completing.required: Select who is completing this form

who-is-representing.required: Select who you are legally representing

sponsor-type.required: Select what type of sponsor you are

dependant-or-guardian.required: Select whether you are a dependant or a guardian of a dependant

confirm-sent-letter-of-authority.required: Confirm you have sent the Home Office a letter of authority

legal-rep-name.required: Enter the name of the legal firm or representative
legal-rep-name.notUrl: Answer must not contain a URL. Remove any links, URLs or special characters like /@:%_+~#=\ from your answer.
legal-rep-name.maxlength: Name or legal firm or representative must be less than 150 characters

application-type.required: Select what the application was for

visa-type.required: Select what type of visa the application was for

further-leave-to-remain.required: Select which type of further leave you applied for

main-applicant-full-name.required: Enter the main applicant's full name
main-applicant-full-name.minlength: Applicant's full name must be between 3 and 250 characters
main-applicant-full-name.maxlength: Applicant's full name must be between 3 and 250 characters
main-applicant-full-name.notUrl: Answer must not contain a URL. Remove any links, URLs or special characters like /@:%_+~#=\ from your answer

main-applicant-dob.required: Enter the applicant's date of birth
main-applicant-dob.before: Main applicant's date of birth must be in the past
main-applicant-dob.after: Enter a real date of birth
main-applicant-dob.date: Enter a real date of birth

main-applicant-nationality.required: Select the main applicant's country of nationality

enter-document-type.required: Enter the other type of document you need us to return
enter-document-type.notUrl: Answer must not contain a URL. Remove any links, URLs or special characters like /@:%_+~#=\ from your answer
enter-document-type.maxlength: Other document type must be less than 100 characters

document-description.notUrl: Answer must not contain a URL. Remove any links, URLs or special characters like /@:%_+~#=\ from your answer
document-description.maxlength: Document descriptions cannot be more than than 5,000 characters

date-of-application.required: Enter the date the main applicant submitted the application, for example 27 3 2023
date-of-application.before: Date the main applicant submitted the application must be in the past
date-of-application.after: Date that the main applicant submitted the application must be within the last 120 years

cancel-application.required: Select if you want to cancel the application

contact-telephone.minlength: Enter a telephone number, like 01632 960 001, 07700 900 982 or +44 808 157 0192
contact-telephone.maxlength: Enter a telephone number, like 01632 960 001, 07700 900 982 or +44 808 157 0192
contact-telephone.validInternationalPhoneNumber: Enter a telephone number, like 01632 960 001, 07700 900 982 or +44 808 157 0192
contact-telephone.notUrl: Answer must not contain a URL. Remove any links, URLs or special characters like /@:%_+~#=\ from your answer

is-requesting-passport-to-travel.required: Select if you need the main applicant's passport for travel

notes.extraNotes: Request notes cannot be more than 2,000 characters
notes.notUrl: Answer must not contain a URL. Remove any links, URLs or special characters like /@:%_+~#=\ from your answer

rod-reference-number.required: You must provide a reference number. Select one you can provide

rod-case-id.minlength: Case ID must be at least 8 numbers
rod-case-id.maxlength: Case ID cannot be more than 8 numbers
rod-case-id.numeric: Case ID can only include numbers
rod-case-id.notUrl: Answer must not contain a URL. Remove any links, URLs or special characters like /@:%_+~#=\ from your answer.

rod-ho-reference-number.required: Enter a Home Office reference number
rod-ho-reference-number.minlength: Home Office reference must be at least 8 characters
rod-ho-reference-number.maxlength: Home Office reference number cannot be more than 8 numbers
rod-ho-reference-number.hoRefNum: Home Office reference number must start with a letter, followed by 7 numbers
rod-ho-reference-number.specialCharacter: Home Office reference number must only include letters and numbers
rod-ho-reference-number.notUrl: Answer must not contain a URL. Remove any links, URLs or special characters like /@:%_+~#=\ from your answer.

rod-payment-reference-number.maxlength: Payment reference number cannot be more than 100 characters
rod-payment-reference-number.notUrl: Answer must not contain a URL. Remove any links, URLs or special characters like /@:%_+~#=\ from your answer.

rod-courier-reference-number.maxlength: Courier reference number cannot be more than 100 characters
rod-courier-reference-number.notUrl: Answer must not contain a URL. Remove any links, URLs or special characters like /@:%_+~#=\ from your answer.
